data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Heves, Hungary to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Heves, Hungary
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Heves that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 32 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 9,762 believers in the state of Heves with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.prayer: Father, we ask for 63 new simple churches in the state of Heves, Hungary. Place a simple church in every community of the 319,500 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Jew, Hungarian-speaking people. Make the Jew, Hungarian-speaking people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 9,762 believers in Heves, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 319,500 citizens of Heves, Hungary, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.section_summary:
the state of Heves, Hungary has a population of 319,500.

We estimate Heves has 9,762 people who might know Jesus, 268,312 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 41,426 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 32 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Heves, Hungary.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

location.name: Heves
location.people_groups_list: Turk, Chinese, general, Bosniak, Vietnamese, Arab, general
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Turk (2,500), Chinese, general (6,400), Bosniak (19,000), Vietnamese (3,300), Arab, general (5,200)
